document.discussion_title: Officer shoots, kills man who charged at him with knives, police say
document.topic_text: Officer shoots, kills man who charged at him with knives, police say American-Statesman Sunday 24th April, 2016 A 29-year-old man who police say was running toward an officer with knives in his hands was shot to death by police in a Southwest Austin supermarket parking lot late Friday. The incident is the fifth encounter this year — and the third this month — in which Austin police have fired their guns. It also resulted in the third officer-involved death in three months.Austin Police Chief Art Acevedo, who noted that two of his officers have been wounded by gunfire this year, said he was ';really concerned about the uptick in violence against law enforcement.';...
document.post: Officer shoots, kills man who charged at him with knives, police say American-Statesman Sunday 24th April, 2016 A 29-year-old man who police say was running toward an officer with knives in his hands was shot to death by police in a Southwest Austin supermarket parking lot late Friday. The incident is the fifth encounter this year — and the third this month — in which Austin police have fired their guns. It also resulted in the third officer-involved death in three months.Austin Police Chief Art Acevedo, who noted that two of his officers have been wounded by gunfire this year, said he was ';really concerned about the uptick in violence against law enforcement.';...
